attackable

Class Attackable

  • java.lang.Object
    • positionable.Positionable
      • attackable.Attackable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Obstacle, Robot

    public abstract class Attackable
extends Positionable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class that includes all the Positionables that can be attacked and for this reason they have a life and a defense.
    Author:
    Mattia Rosselli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth(double h)
        Method that changes the health. If the value is more than 100 this is set to 100 otherwise if is passed a value less than 0 it is set to 0
        Parameters:
        h - New Health value
